SELECT a.file_seq AS "fileSeq", a.file_dtl_seq AS "fileDtlSeq", a.file_original_nm AS "fileOriginNm", a.file_reg_dttm AS "fileRegDttm", a.file_server_nm AS "fileServerNm", a.file_fmt AS "fileFmt", a.grp_cd_dtl_nm AS "grpCdDtlNm" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.file_seq) AS ROW_NUM, a.file_seq , b.file_dtl_seq, b.file_original_nm, a.file_reg_dttm, b.file_server_nm, b.file_fmt, c.grp_cd_dtl_nm FROM file_info a, file_detail_info b, group_code_detail c
WHERE c.grp_cd_id='F' AND
a.file_seq(+) = b.file_seq
AND a.grp_cd_dtl_id = c.grp_cd_dtl_id
AND ( EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) > #{FileMngVo.startYr} OR (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) = #{FileMngVo.startYr} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) >= #{FileMngVo.startMn}) )
AND ( EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) < #{FileMngVo.endYr} OR (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) = #{FileMngVo.endYr} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) <= #{FileMngVo.endMn}) )
AND a.grp_cd_dtl_id = #{FileMngVo.grpCdDtlId}
AND a.file_reg_user LIKE '%'||#{FileMngVo.fileRegUser}||'%'
AND b.file_original_nm LIKE '%'||#{FileMngVo.fileOriginNm}||'%'
AND b.file_server_nm LIKE '%'||#{FileMngVo.fileServerNm}||'%'
) a
WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{firstRowNum} AND #{lastRowNum}

select COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.file_seq) AS ROW_NUM, a.file_seq AS "fileSeq", b.file_dtl_seq AS "fileDtlSeq", b.file_original_nm AS "fileOriginNm", a.file_reg_dttm AS "fileRegDttm", b.file_server_nm AS "fileServerNm", b.file_fmt AS "fileFmt", c.grp_cd_dtl_nm AS "grpCdDtlNm" FROM file_info a, file_detail_info b, group_code_detail c WHERE
c.grp_cd_id='F'
AND a.file_seq(+) = b.file_seq AND a.grp_cd_dtl_id = c.grp_cd_dtl_id
AND ( EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) > #{FileMngVo.startYr} OR (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) = #{FileMngVo.startYr} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) >= #{FileMngVo.startMn}) )
AND ( EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) < #{FileMngVo.endYr} OR (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) = #{FileMngVo.endYr} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM a.FILE_REG_DTTM) <= #{FileMngVo.endMn}) )
AND a.grp_cd_dtl_id = #{FileMngVo.grpCdDtlId}
AND a.file_reg_user LIKE '%'||#{FileMngVo.fileRegUser}||'%'
AND b.file_original_nm LIKE '%'||#{FileMngVo.fileOriginNm}||'%'
AND b.file_server_nm LIKE '%'||#{FileMngVo.fileServerNm}||'%'
)
select distinct grp_cd_dtl_nm AS "grpCdDtlNm", grp_cd_dtl_id AS "grpCdDtlId" from group_code_detail where grp_cd_id ='F'
